about_the_game:
The cities were overrun, by a relentless horde of zombies, the result of a catastrophic experiment gone awry. The undead were relentless, and no cure could turn back the tide of decay that swept over the planet.

The remnants of humanity turned to the only hope left: Titans. These machines were the legacy of a bygone era, their origins lost to myth and legend, now resurrected as humanity’s last line of defense.

In the heart of the wasteland that was once a thriving metropolis, the Titanforge facility stood as a bastion of hope. Here, engineers and soldiers worked side by side, forging alliances and crafting their path to survival.

Commander Maya Strickland, a veteran of countless battles, led the charge. She was a master pilot, her mind and spirit fused with her Titan, Aegis Prime. Together, they were an unstoppable force, her strategic prowess matched only by the Titan’s raw power.

As the sun set on what could be Earth’s final day, the ground shook with the approach of the undead legion. The air was filled with the electric hum of the Titans powering up, their eyes glowing like beacons in the encroaching darkness.

“Today, we fight not just for our lives, but for the future of all humanity!” Commander Strickland’s voice boomed over the comms. “We are the Titans and we will hold the line!”

The battle was a symphony of destruction. Aegis Prime’s cannons roared, cutting swathes through the undead ranks. Each Titan moved with lethal grace, their pilots’ wills bending metal and circuitry to their command.

As the night wore on, the tide began to turn. The relentless advance of the zombies was halted, then pushed back. The Titans stood tall amidst the chaos, their forms battered but unbroken.

When dawn broke, the survivors emerged from their mechs, weary but alive. They had won the battle, but the war for Earth’s future was just beginning.

In the aftermath, Commander Strickland looked out over the horizon. The world was changed, but as long as the Titans stood, there was hope.

And so, the Titans marched on, their metal feet echoing the heartbeat of a world fighting to live once more.


Key Features:

Colossal Mechs, Limitless Exploration: These towering machines become your vessels for exploration and survival. Traverse unknown landscapes, uncover hidden secrets, and adapt to the ever-changing environment.

Zee’s Enigma: Why are we here? Who is Zee? These questions propel you forward, urging you to unravel the tapestry of this enigmatic world. Zee’s survival holds the keys to our destiny.

Craft Your Path: Establish outposts, gather rare materials, and master the art of mech modification. Customize your war machine, from reinforced armor to energy-efficient thrusters.

Epic Battles Across Realms: Ground warfare, naval clashes, and dogfights in the skies—prepare for adrenaline-pumping confrontations. The fate of our kind hinges on your prowess.

Forge Alliances: Seek allies among fellow pilots. Together, you’ll uncover the truth, face PvP challenges, and shape the course of history.

Why Titanforge?
Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in a visually striking world where every detail matters.
Dynamic Gameplay: Adapt, strategize, and conquer. The environment evolves, and so must you.

Prepare to Pilot: The colossal mech awaits your command. Explore the unknown, uncover the truth, and forge your legacy.
Join the Titanforge community on Steam and be part of an epic saga!

content_descriptors.notes:
Welcome to our game, where you and your friends take on hordes of mutant monsters in a battle to save the population of Arkan. You'll need to use your skills and a range of weapons to take down these vicious creatures. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter instances of blood and gore, as well as the potential for accidental friendly fire that can result in your teammate being knocked out temporarily.

However, we've taken care to ensure that the overall level of violence in the game is appropriate for a wide audience. We do not depict sexual acts, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm in the game.

We believe that our game offers a thrilling and engaging adventure that will appeal to players who enjoy action and adventure games. Thank you for considering our game, and we hope that you'll join us in the fight against the mutant horde.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3 or Ryzen3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 1070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 or Ryzen7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Rtx 3070Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
